column5: In the heart of historic Old East Dallas, this is a beautiful 1930’s Victorian apartment house that’s as classic as it is comfortable. Relax on the big, shared upstairs balcony with a cup of coffee or glass of wine overlooking sleepy Junius Street. Find original character everywhere with modern amenities like highspeed WiFi, Amazon Fire TV w/ Netflix and Hulu. Prime location near Downtown, Deep Ellum and Lower Greenville. Cafes, shopping, nightlife and restaurants are conveniently close.
